"use strict";

var Cylon = require("cylon");

Cylon.robot({
  connections: {
    sphero: { adaptor: "sphero", port: "/dev/rfcomm0" }
  },

  devices: {
    sphero: { driver: "sphero" }
  },

  work: function(my) {
    every((1).second(), function() {

We tell sphero to change the color of its RGB LED to a random value. We can also use my.sphero.color(0x00FF00); if we want an specific color.

 
      my.sphero.randomColor();
    });
  }
}).start();
